Class ConfigBoardController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.Controller.Subcontrollers.ConfigBoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class ConfigBoardController extends Object implements ActionListener
Used to determine logic based on ConfigBoardView input
